the saloon doors clap against the wall, a cloud of lazy dust falls to the floor. A silhouette takes shape, cut out of bright daylight outside.

Boots. Gun. Hat. The Sheriff takes a few well-placed heavy steps, hand placed on his holster as a warning. The townsfolk can’t decide whether the proper reaction should be silence or chatter.

Sii, the sheriff, quickly draws his gun of sarcasm, pulls the hammer back with his thumb.

“I hear talk you’re asking folk here for free typefaces” he says, before spitting on the floor, “what do you call yourself stranger?”

“I’m saratyp,” says the stranger in a bold comic sans voice, “I don’t see what the problem is, I wasn’t going to hurt nobody....”

” You can find all the free fonts you need at 2,002 Honest Fonts.”

I couldn’t stop laughing when I visited this site! [GOLD!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232755/http:/www.somethingawful.com/fakesa/fontsite/)
